title: American_Dad_S01E01-S03E12 [PROPER EPISODES, NO MIXUPS]
description:
Okay, so!

This is one of those series that are plagued by wrong classifications,
particularly the misconception that there were only seven episodes in
season one. This resulted in releases online that stated they were,
for instance, season two episode three, while it was in reality season
one episode ten.

This would not be a problem if only this misconception had continued.
But, as it were, the release groups picked up on the error and starting
naming their releases properly. But really that just added to the
confusion. Suddenly you&#039;d have an S02E03 by LOL that was actually S01E10,
AND an S02E03 by XOR that was indeed S02E03. But how could the regular
downloader know which was which, or even know there was a difference?
We see lots of tv show episodes by different groups all the time, and
usually we just pick one of them. In this case, that would prove to be
a bad strategy. As it has for many peers out there.

So basically, here&#039;s the remedy. I decided to sort this thing once and for
all, and I&#039;ve scoured the &#039;net on different channels for the original,
RAR&#039;ed releases, which I&#039;ve succeeded in doing except for three cases, where
I had to settle for the expanded AVI file. There&#039;s also one episode that
I really have no clue whether it&#039;s released by LOL, XOR or someone else.
Not that this matters to regular people, but if you&#039;re the collecting
kind of dude like me, well, you kinda tend to get a bit anal about it ;)

The bottom line is that this here is all episodes (as far as I know anyway,
I haven&#039;t heard about any "specials" or stuff like that) from S01E01 to
S03E12, in one neat torrent.

Download, unpack, enjoy, and stop worrying about mixed up episodes! From
here on out, you just have to get the latest episodes which are all
properly named :)

Please don&#039;t bitch about the RAR files! It takes five seconds to unpack
these things, so no whining!

PS: If anyone has the last proper RAR&#039;ed releases, please up them! :)

PPS: I might not be super stable, as I&#039;m on a wifi, and sometimes it
dies, and I&#039;m not gonna hang around long after I&#039;ve seeded fully, so
HELP ME SEED! Thank you.
